name: Eric Ken Shinseki
alma_mater: United States Military Academy, Duke University, United States Army Command and General Staff College, National War College
commands: Army Chief of Staff, 1st Cavalry Division, 3rd Infantry Division, Seventh United States Army,  Allied Land Forces Central Europe (General), NATO Stabilization Force in Bosnia-Herzegovina, 9th Infantry Division, 25th Infantry Division, 3rd Armored Cavalry Regiment, 5th Cavalry Regiment
awards: Defense Distinguished Service Medal (2), Navy Distinguished Service Medal, Army Distinguished Service Medal (2), Air Force Distinguished Service Medal, Coast Guard Distinguished Service Medal, Legion of Merit (2), Bronze Star (3),  Purple Heart (2), Meritorious Service Medal, Air Medal, Army Commendation Medal (2),
